content: ready to crochet an easy flower granny square this pretty flower afghan square was designed as part of the 2023 bamcal grab your medium weight / worsted weight yarn 4 and a 5 5 mm i crochet hook and get ready to make it in just a few hours the pattern includes round by round photos > this pattern is available for free on > my blog which is monetized by ads if > you prefer an ad-free version of the > pattern it is available to purchase > right here on ravelry the premium pattern includes a stitch diagram ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ tiktok https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/c/oombawkadesigncrochet sub_confi… facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2023 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
